divs: sighting detailsi have reported this to mufon via phone after seeing i was not the only one whom have seen or reported this on this website i decided to add my own visual of event. i woke up close to 6:30am on the 14th of dec and decided to go outside to have a smoke as soon as i walked outside a bright object due south\east of me caught my eye, it was very bright and at first i thought it was venus but then i spotted venus at about 2 o'clock position from the initial object in question i knew then it wasn't venus, i found it very odd as i glanced at it some more it got brighter so i ran inside and dashed for my camera and started to record iwas able to catch venus and as i aimed the camera toward the unknowned light i the sky it seemed to vanished.... now my video may or may not have caught the unknown light, i can't seem to find it of yet but i know where it was when i review the footage.... the video data also stamped time of recording as dec 15, 2010 6:40am with 45 seconds this purpose of report is to confirm the other 2 reports on mufon. note: the orange circle represents where in the area the mystery object (is\was) at moment of taking video. the pic included is a snapshot from actual video.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Addison
There was one other sighting in Addison on or around December 14th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Oval Light I thought was Venus at 1st which wasn't
